Tasks.Task Description: Regularly review and update security policies related to Azure Bastion to ensure they align with organizational security standards and best practices.
Continuously monitor access logs for Azure Bastion to detect any unauthorized access attempts or suspicious activities.
Configure and maintain Network Security Groups (NSGs) to restrict access to Azure Bastion and ensure only authorized IP addresses can connect.
Perform regular security audits of Azure Bastion configurations and access controls to ensure compliance with security policies.
Review and update the Azure Bastion service configuration to incorporate the latest security features and enhancements.
Enable diagnostic settings for Azure Bastion to collect logs and metrics for security monitoring and analysis.
Regularly review and update user access permissions to Azure Bastion to ensure that only authorized personnel have access.
Perform incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents involving Azure Bastion. Ensure familiarity with response protocols.
Regularly back up the configuration settings of Azure Bastion to ensure quick recovery in case of misconfiguration or failure.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular security training to stay updated with new Azure Bastion security features and best practices.
